summary: A Resource Pack With Regular Updates
descriptionHtml:
The MegaResourcePack is a pack that will be regularly updated that will have a lot of things in various cells that you can go too that will be called aaaresources and it will have a various word(s) after it, for example potions, poisons, etc. dont forget to load up my plugin with yours and DO NOT set my one active, YOUR PLUGIN must be active, mine just has to be clicked also, please tell me if you find any problems and check this mod often because as I said it will be updated often, if I leave anyone out in the credits then let me know and I will put you in

REQUIRED MESHES AND TEXTURES

Lilith - Catering by Lilith
 http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1264-catering-by-lilith/

Insanity - Food Stuff
http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1203-insanitys-food-stuffs-resource/

Jokerines - Misc Resource
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53022/?

Bluary - Food Containers
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/?

[b]Oaristys and Tony67 - FoodContainer Resource
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/?

Liv2dieat8  / [b]Kjell Granlund  - Addon Textures - Soup
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6107/?[/b]
[/b]
Darkfox127 - Creation Kit Tutorials and Resources
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53956/?

V 1.1

Upadated with  (Custom)

Tile Foors with 6 Designs
Stone Floor with 8 Designs
Marble Floor with 14 Designs

this resource includes:

[b][i][u]7 Plate Sets [/u][/i][/b]-1 Basic, 1 Wooden, 1 Golden, 1 Nordic,1  Dwemer, 1 Silver  and 1 Glazed

[b][u][i]2 Tankard Sets[/i][/u][/b] - 2 Basic / [u][i][b]8 Cup Sets[/b][/i][/u] - 4 dwemer, 2 Glazed and 2 Nordic

[b][u][i]8 Bowl Sets[/i] [/u][/b]- 1 Dwemer, 2 Glazed, 1 Gold, 2 Nordic and 2 Silver

[b][i][u]2 Cutlery Sets[/u][/i][/b] -  1 Basic and 1 Silver / [i][u][b]2 Dinner Sets [/b][/u][/i]- 1 Basic and 1 Dwemer /[i][u][b] 2 Platter Sets [/b][/u][/i]- 1 Gold and 1 Silver 

[i][b][u]2 Pitchers[/u][/b][/i] - 1 Gold and 1 Silver / [i][b][u]3 Pot Sets[/u][/b][/i] - 2 Basic and 1 Dwemer /[i][b][u] 1 Cauldron [/u][/b][/i]- 1 Basic

[i][u]2 Ovens[/u]  - Indoor and Out door  / 2 potbelly Stoves / 2 Stoves

[/i][b][i][u]Various[/u][/i][/b] kitchen Bits and Pieces - pots, pans, whisk, ladle, teapot, grinder and more

[b][i][u]4 Onyx variations -[/u][/i][/b] 2 plates, 2 bows, 1 pitcher, 1 cup and 1 goblet 

[u]1[/u][i][b][u]3 Meals[/u][/b][/i] - 3 gold plates, 3 silver plates, 3 wood and 4 glazed

[u][i][b]7 Everyday Foods in Your Home[/b][/i][/u] - cocoa, coffee, water, milk, sugar, flour and butter
[u][i][b]
17 Various soups / 10 various Fruits / 18 various desserts [/b][/i][/u]

[b]Another Dessert variation of 31 [/b]/ [u]18 More Various Foods / [/u][b][i][u]Another Dessert variation of 18[/u][/i][/b]

[b][i][u]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/u][/i][/b]

6 Poison Racks - Dwemer  - 4 Large shelves, 2 Small shelves and 1 Wall Shelf

5 Poison Racks - Upper- 1 Large shelf,  1 small Shelf, 1 Round Table, 1 Square Table and 1 Long Table

11 Poison Racks - Common - 2 Large Shelves,  3 Small Shelves, 1 Round Table, 1 Square Table, 1 Thin Table, 1 Long Table and 2 crates

16 Poison Racks - Noble -  4 Large Shelves,  2 Small Shelves, 1 Round Table, 1 Square Table, 1 Thin Table....
....1 Long Table, 2 Wall Shelves, 2 Corner Shelves  and 2 crates

4 Posion Racks  - Glass Noble - 3 large and 1 Small

[b][i][u]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/u][/i][/b]

6 Potion Racks - Dwemer  - 4 Large shelves, 2 Small shelves and 1 Wall Shelf

5 Potion Racks - Upper- 1 Large shelf,  1 small Shelf, 1 Round Table, 1 Square Table and 1 Long Table

11 Potion Racks - Common - 2 Large Shelves,  3 Small Shelves, 1 Round Table, 1 Square Table, 1 Thin Table, 1 Long Table and 2 crates

16 Potion Racks - Noble -  4 Large Shelves,  2 Small Shelves, 1 Round Table, 1 Square Table, 1 Thin Table....
....1 Long Table, 2 Wall Shelves, 2 Corner Shelves  and 2 crates

4 Potion Racks  - Glass Noble - 3 large and 1 Small

[b][i][u]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/u][/i][/b]


6 Beds - Upper - 3 Double ( Enter at different sides) and 3 Single ( Enter at different sides)

6 Beds - Orc- 3 Double ( Enter at different sides) and 3 Single ( Enter at different sides)

9 Beds - Noble - 6 Double ( Enter at different sides) and 3 Single ( Enter at different sides)

3 Beds - HH -  3 Single ( Enter at different sides)  / 1 Bedroll

5 Beds - Dwemer - 2 Double ( Enter at different sides) and 3 Single ( Enter at different sides)

5 Beds - Common - 2 Double ( Enter at different sides) and 3 Single ( Enter at different sides) / 7 Hay Mounds

[b][i][u]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/u][/i][/b]


7 Sovngarde Benches / 8 Upper Benches / 6 Dwemer  Benches  / 3 Common  Benches 

4 Nordic  Benches  / 1 HH  Benches  / 1 WR Temple  Bench / 10 Noble  Benches 

[b][i][u]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/u][/i][/b]

6 Orc Chairs ( Sit at Different Sides ) / 6 Upper Chairs ( Sit at Different Sides ) 12 Common Chairs ( Sit at Different Sides )

24  Dwemer Chairs ( Sit at Different Sides ) / 8 HH Chairs ( Sit at Different Sides ) / 5 Noble Chairs ( Sit at Different Sides )
